column2: I do feel a bit of trembling. We may no longer be all hunky-dory.
That's not seismic in originâ€”it's gaseous!
Dust motes in the cosmos. Mites in the eyes of God.
We should pull back, because whatever that is doesn't sound friendly.
Certainly not a spot to stop for a picnic.
Eyes? Any eyes on the source?
I haven't seen anything big enough to shake the mountain, and I also don't want to.
...something doesn't feel right. This feels familiar.
